ygData.subject: Re: All charged items are total garbage.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You , and the other 200 people that want fishbone earrings, not to mention those that don t care about their faction with the barbies... (some of us do)
ygData.messageBody:
ms277017@... wrote:
>
> From: ms277017@...
>
> I dont know why verant even brought charged items into the game, they are so
> stupid. There is no way to recharge them so why even use them? Anyone else
> agree? do a /feedback and join me... Tinkers really got the shaft, 50
> charges, 1 charge, still the same bullshit, its by far easier to camp HADDEN
> a 8 hour spawn with a rare drop fishbone earring than to shell out 300+ pp
You , and the other 200 people that want fishbone earrings, not to
mention those that don't care about their faction with the barbies...
(some of us do) and so will kill him repeatedly to sell off the
earrings... think 300pp is unreasonable, try buying that fishbone
earrings , all I have to say is good luck.

/Nosferatu aka Phebos enchantress (level 30!) on Sol Ro
